Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to transform into event log. We need to group events into cases. Likely each document editing session is a case: Document1.docx editing, Quarterly_Report.docx editing, Budget_2024.xlsx editing, Email about Annual Meeting reply, PDF review.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: But maybe combine related tasks: The user edits Document1.docx (case 1), then replies email (case 2), then reviews PDF (case 3), then edits Excel (case 4), then updates Word doc again (maybe same case as Document1? but its separate). Actually after closing Document1 and focusing Quarterly_Report, thats a new case.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We can define cases by window title or by logical unit: e.g. Document1 Editing Session includes focus at 09:00:00 until close at 09:07:00. That includes typing, save, switch to Chrome etc? Wait the user switched from Word to Chrome while still in same session? They might be working on the same task of preparing the report; but we can treat each distinct activity as separate case if they are independent.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Simpler approach: Each distinct application window is a case. So: Case ID: - DOC1_EDIT - EMAIL_REPLY - PDF_REVIEW - EXCEL_UPDATE - DOC2_EDIT But we also have switching back to Word for inserting reference; that could be part of DOC1_EDIT or separate? Might treat as part of DOC1_EDIT because its same document.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Lets propose: Case 001 - Editing Document1.docx Events: FOCUS at 08:59... Actually first focus was Quarterly_Report; but first event for Doc1 is focus at 09:00. Sequence until close at 09:07. Case002 - Email Reply about Annual Meeting Events from switch to Chrome until send email and back to Acrobat? Actually after send email they switched to Acrobat; so email reply ends before switch out. So events from click open email until send email inclusive. Case003 - Review Report_Draft.pdf in Acrobat Events from switch to Acrobat until scroll/hightlight etc maybe end when no more events for that window before next app change. Case004 - Update Budget_2024.xlsx in Excel Case005 - Editing Quarterly_Report.docx Alternatively combine Doc2 with earlier quarter report? Its separate session after closing previous doc.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Define activity names mapping: FOCUS -> Open/Focus TYPING -> Edit SAVE -> Save SWITCH -> not an activity but transition between cases. CLICK Open Email -> Open Email CLICK Reply -> Reply Email Send Email -> Send Email SCROLL -> maybe ignore or map as Scroll if needed. HIGHLIGHT -> Highlight Text

Name: Validation - PE
Text: But we may want only meaningful activities per case. For process mining we might keep all events though some low-level like SCROLL may be noise but okay include them with generic names.
